00042 #ifndef _orxANDROID_H_
00043 #define _orxANDROID_H_

00045 #if defined(__orxANDROID__)
00046 
00047 #include <jni.h>
00048 
00049 extern orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION  pfnRun;
00050 
00051 void MainLoop();
00052 
00053 static orxINLINE void orx_Execute(orxU32 _u32NbParams, orxSTRING _azParams[], const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00054 {
00055   /* Inits the Debug System */
00056   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00057 
00058   /* Checks */
00059 //  orxASSERT(_u32NbParams > 0);
00060 //  orxASSERT(_azParams != orxNULL);
00061   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00062 
00063   /* register run function */
00064   pfnRun = _pfnRun;
00065 
00066   /* Registers main module */
00067   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00068 
00069   /* Registers all other modules */
00070   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00071 
00072   /* Calls all modules setup */
00073   orxModule_SetupAll();
00074 
00075   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00076   if(orxParam_SetArgs(_u32NbParams, _azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00077   {
00078     MainLoop();
00079   }
00080 
00081   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00082 
00083   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00084 }

00086 #elif defined (__orxANDROID_NATIVE__)

00088   #include <android/log.h>
00089   #include <android_native_app_glue.h>
00090   #include <android/sensor.h>
00091 
00092 #define  LOG_TAG    "orxAndroid.h"
00093 #define  LOGI(...)  __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO,LOG_TAG,__VA_ARGS__)
00094 #define  LOGE(...)  __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_ERROR,LOG_TAG,__VA_ARGS__)
00095 
00096 /* Defined in orxAndroidNativeSupport.c */
00097 extern struct android_app *pstApp;
00098 extern orxS32                     u32NbParams;
00099 extern orxSTRING                 *azParams;
00100 extern orxS32                     s32Animating;
00101 extern const ASensor             *poAccelerometerSensor;
00102 extern ASensorEventQueue         *poSensorEventQueue;
00103 
00104 static orxINLINE void orx_Execute(orxU32 _u32NbParams, orxSTRING _azParams[], const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00105 {
00106   /* Inits the Debug System */
00107   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00108 
00109   /* Checks */
00110   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00111 
00112   /* Registers main module */
00113   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00114 
00115   /* Registers all other modules */
00116   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00117 
00118   /* Calls all modules setup */
00119   orxModule_SetupAll();
00120 
00121   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00122   if(orxParam_SetArgs(_u32NbParams, _azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00123   {
00124     /* Inits the engine */
00125     if(orxModule_Init(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00126     {
00127       /* Registers default event handler */
00128       orxEvent_AddHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00129 
00130       /* Displays help */
00131       if(orxParam_DisplayHelp() != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00132       {
00133         orxSTATUS eClockStatus, eMainStatus;
00134         orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00135         orxBOOL   bStop;
00136 
00137         /* Clears payload */
00138         orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00139 
00140         /* Main loop */
00141         for(bStop = orxFALSE, sbStopByEvent = orxFALSE;
00142             bStop == orxFALSE;
00143             bStop = ((sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) || (eMainStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE) || (eClockStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE)) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE)
00144         {
00145           /* Reads all pending events */
00146           orxS32 s32Ident, s32Events;
00147           struct android_poll_source *pstSource;
00148 
00149           /* For all system events */
00150           while((s32Ident = ALooper_pollAll(((s32Animating != 0) || (pstApp->destroyRequested != 0)) ? 0 : -1, NULL, (int *)&s32Events, (void **)&pstSource)) >= 0)
00151           {
00152              /* Valid source? */
00153              if(pstSource != NULL)
00154              {
00155                /* Process its event */
00156                pstSource->process(pstApp, pstSource);
00157              }
00158 
00159             /* If a sensor has data, process it now */
00160             if(s32Ident == LOOPER_ID_USER)
00161             {
00162               /* Has accelerometer? */
00163               if(poAccelerometerSensor != NULL)
00164               {
00165                 orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stAccelPayload;
00166                 ASensorEvent            oEvent;
00167 
00168                 /* Inits event's payload */
00169                 orxMemory_Zero(&stAccelPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00170 
00171                 /* For all accelerometer events */
00172                 while(ASensorEventQueue_getEvents(poSensorEventQueue, &oEvent, 1) > 0)
00173                 {
00174                   /* Inits event */
00175                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.vAcceleration.fX = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.x;
00176                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.vAcceleration.fY = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.y;
00177                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.vAcceleration.fZ = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.z;
00178 
00179                   /* Sends event */
00180                   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_ACCELERATE, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stAccelPayload);
00181                 }
00182               }
00183             }
00184           }
00185 
00186           /* Should update? */
00187           if((s32Animating != 0) || (pstApp->destroyRequested != 0))
00188           {
00189             /* Sends frame start event */
00190             orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00191 
00192             /* Runs the engine */
00193             eMainStatus = _pfnRun();
00194 
00195             /* Updates clock system */
00196             eClockStatus = orxClock_Update();
00197 
00198             /* Sends frame stop event */
00199             orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00200 
00201             /* Updates frame counter */
00202             stPayload.u32FrameCounter++;
00203           }
00204         }
00205       }
00206 
00207       /* Removes event handler */
00208       orxEvent_RemoveHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00209 
00210       /* Exits from engine */
00211       orxModule_Exit(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN);
00212     }
00213 
00214     /* Exits from all modules */
00215     orxModule_ExitAll();
00216   }
00217   
00218   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00219   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00220 }
